title: Mini pizza flyers
description: Kids will love making these mini pizzas. Let them get creative and pick their own toppings.

show.b01ncdlj: I Can Cook on the Go

default: Selection of toppings such as fresh basil, sliced peppers and shredded cooked chicken

steps: Use a 7cm/2¾in cookie cutter to cut six small circles out of the wrap and place on a baking tray.
Spoon a teaspoon of passata onto each circle and spread it to the edge. Sprinkle over some toppings and top with some grated cheese.
Bake in the oven for 10-15 minutes or until the cheese is melted and golden-brown.
